# EnumerableExtensions.IsNullOrEmpty&lt;T&gt; method

Indicates whether the specified IEnumerable collection is null or empty.

```csharp
public static bool IsNullOrEmpty<T>(this IEnumerable<T> items)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| T | The IEnumerable objects type |
| items | List of objects |

## Return Value

true if the IEnumerable is null or empty; otherwise, false.
